Question.Subject: Amazon Gift Certificate Help?
Question.Content: 'There's something wrong with the gift certificate claim code you entered. Please check for transposed digits, omitted digits, and similar errors.' that is the message i get everytime i enter it in correctly and i know cause ive tried all the possibilties. i got a Â£30 amazon GC for xmas and want to buy a ps3 controller but it wont accept it plz help me!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
look for an expiration date?? might be too late.
if you dont get it to work, try emailing amazon customer services.

Answer.Content:
look for an expiration date?? might be too late.
if you dont get it to work, try emailing amazon customer services.
